uploadFileExplanation1: You may upload a csv file with the container/package information
uploadFileExplanation2: It is advised that you download the sample file and edit it according to your needs
uploadFileExplanation3: Note that some of the columns are exclusive to a container and some are exclusive to a package
dropOrClick: Click or drop a file here
canOnlyUploadCSV: You can only upload a CSV file
inputError: Input error: {{object}} {{key}} should be of type {{type}}, but received {{value}}
mustBeOnlyOneContainer: There should be only one container
duplicateColumn: The input contains a duplicate column {{column}}
invalidColumn: The input contains an invalid column {{column}}
invalidObjectKey: The input contains an unexpected object
finishDialogContent: Confirm to view the solution, export to save your input for later use
enterInput: If you want to enter input, click on Find packing.
insertSolutionFile: If you want to insert a solution file to go directly to the 3D screen, click View Solution.
packagesColor: If you want to change the color of the packages (by type) click on the color circle in the map on the left.
clickEditButton: To change the resulting solution, click the edit button and then the package you want to edit.
rightMenu: The buttons on the right menu are the same colors as the arrows next to the container - this indicates the direction of movement according to the color of the button.
multiplePackages: You can select multiple packages by click on:
focusCamera: You can focus the camera on the clicked package. The camera will then rotate around that package by click on:
exportInfo: If you want to export the solution, click the download button.
insertFileInHome: You can insert the downloaded file as input on the home page after clicking on View solution and immediately switch to the 3D screen.
packageOutOfBounds: Package {{pkgType}} is not fully inside the container
